snippet: Al Horford ended the waiting game with a simple tweet: "Celtic Pride," it said, followed by 18 shamrocks....
lead_paragraph: Al Horford ended the waiting game with a simple tweet: "Celtic Pride," it said, followed by 18 shamrocks.

headline.main: AP Source: Al Horford Picks Celtics, Agreeing to $113M Deal
headline.print_headline: AP Source: Al Horford Picks Celtics, Agreeing to $113M Deal
